meanings.sent1: The overburned toast was black and crunchy.
meanings.sent2: The overburned wood had a strong smell of smoke.
meanings.sent3: The overburned marshmallow looked like a tiny black cloud.
meanings.sent4: The overburned paper crumbled at the slightest touch.
meanings.sent5: The overburned cookies were inedible, like charcoal.

meanings.definition: Exhausted or overwhelmed from excessive work or stress.
meanings.sent1: She felt overburned after working two double shifts in a row.
meanings.sent2: The students looked overburned after studying for their final exams.
meanings.sent3: He was so overburned from the long meeting that he fell asleep standing up.
meanings.sent4: The overburned computer crashed right in the middle of an important presentation.
meanings.sent5: The overburned athlete collapsed at the finish line, completely drained of energy.
